title: NHM Karnal Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Specialist Posts
description: The National Health Mission (NHM) has declared the official notification for 03 Specialist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS, DNB can grab this chance and apply for the NHM Karnal Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. If you are looking for more, here is a list of Go...
